title: Patrick Facchini
text:
Patrick Facchini (born 28 January 1988 in <a href="Trento">Trento</a>) is an Italian former <a href="road%20bicycle%20racer">road bicycle racer</a>, and current <a href="mountain%20runner">mountain runner</a>. He turned professional for the 2013 season, joining <a href="UCI%20Professional%20Continental">UCI Professional Continental</a> team .
Anti-doping rule violation.
Facchini tested positive for <a href="Tuaminoheptane">Tuaminoheptane</a> at the Tour of Belgium on 30 May 2014 and was subsequently handed a 10-month ban from sports by UCI. His contract with was terminated.
